Interface Locatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent, Briefcase, Camo, ExtraBullet, Invincibility, NightVision, Ninja, Player, Radar, Room, WorldItem

    public interface Locatable
    Locatable is an interface designed for objects that appear on the main game grid. It contains methods for retrieving

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getASCIIDisplayCharacter(boolean visible)
      Returns the ASCII character used to display this object when the game is played in the console.
      char getUnicodeDisplayCharacter(boolean visible)
      Returns the Unicode character used to display this object when the game is played in the console.

    • Method Detail

      • getASCIIDisplayCharacter

        char getASCIIDisplayCharacter(boolean visible)
        Returns the ASCII character used to display this object when the game is played in the console. Whether the tile is visible to the player can be specified. Examples: 'A','r','*',' '.
        Parameters:
        visible - whether the player can see the grid square that contains this object
        Returns:
        the character used to display this object, or null if this object should not be displayed

      • getUnicodeDisplayCharacter

        char getUnicodeDisplayCharacter(boolean visible)
        Returns the Unicode character used to display this object when the game is played in the console. Whether the tile is visible to the player can be specified. Examples: '♕','♿','⚑','♦'.
        Parameters:
        visible - whether the player can see the grid square that contains this object
        Returns:
        the character used to display this object, or null if this object should not be displayed
